name: Tentacles (NathanJesudason)
description: Platformer made for PIGSquad June 2019 Summer Slow Jams. Made by Andrew Luke (Music), Evan Astrue (Sprites), Alan Van Duinen (Environment Design), and Nathan Jesudason (Programming). The game is occult themed, where the player goes through a town overtaken by Lovecraftian monsters and cult members who summon them.
